Title: Christa & Ryan
Plot: Christa's OCD prevents her from eating most foods for fear they are contaminated. To ease her anxiety, she spends hours in front of the mirror with a pair of tweezers ruthlessly tearing into her skin, mostly her face. Christa is completely reliant upon her fianc√© Shawn, but he doesn't know how much more he can take.
